list: Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary
special_abilties.name: Spellcasting
special_abilties.desc: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

special_abilties.name: Hold Breath
special_abilties.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The lizard folk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon

special_abilties.name: Hold Breath
special_abilties.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes

list: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, thorn whip
2nd level (3 slots): heat metal, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): conjure animals (reptiles only), plant growth
special_abilties.name: Spellcasting (Lizardfolk Form Only)
special_abilties.desc: The lizardfolk is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The lizardfolk has the following druid spells prepared:

actions.name: Multiattack (Lizardfolk form only)
actions.description: The lizard folk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage in crocodile form. If the lizardfolk is crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizardfolk can't bite another target. If the lizard revert to its true form, the grapple ends.

actions.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a short or long rest)
actions.description: The lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a crocodile, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilties.name: Hold Breath
special_abilties.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes

special_abilties.name: Skewer
special_abilties.desc: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.type: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

actions.name: Trident
actions.description: or 1d8+3 piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

special_abilties.name: Hold Breath
special_abilties.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The crocodile makes two melee attacks, each one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: and the target is grappled (escape DC16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 strength throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilties.name: Hold Breath
special_abilties.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: and the target it grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: and the target must take a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilties.name: Spider Climb
special_abilties.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilties.name: Web Sense
special_abilties.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature on the same web.

special_abilties.name: Web Walker
special_abilties.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. if the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC: 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poisoning and psychic damage.

special_abilties.name: Amphibious
special_abilties.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water

special_abilties.name: Speak with Frogs and Toad
special_abilties.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in bullywug

special_abilties.name: Standing Leap
special_abilties.desc: The bullywugs long jump is up to 20ft and its high jump is up to 10ft, with or without a running start

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: or 1d8 +1 piercing if used with two hands to make a melee attack

special_abilties.name: Amphibious
special_abilties.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water

special_abilties.name: Speak with Frogs and Toad
special_abilties.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in bullywug

special_abilties.name: Standing Leap
special_abilties.desc: The bullywugs long jump is up to 20ft and its high jump is up to 10ft, with or without a running start

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: or 1d8 + 1 piercing if used with two hands to make a melee attack

actions.name: Tongue
actions.description: If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 12). And if the target is Small or smaller, it is pulled up to 10 feet towards the bullywug, and restrained until the grapple ends. If the target is grappled and in range, the bullywug may make one bite attack against it as a bonus action. The bullywug can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

languages: understand what they knew in life, but cannot speak
data.name: Skeleton

languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its Rotting Fist

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Con saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreased by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the targets hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

actions.name: Dreaful Glare
actions.description: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving thow by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24hours.

data.name: Mummy

special_abilties.name: Favored Enemy
special_abilties.desc: You have advantage on Survival checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on INT checks to recall information about them. You also learn one language of your choice that is spoken by your favored enemies, if they speak one at all.

special_abilties.name: Natural Explorer
special_abilties.desc: You have a favored terrain type. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for proficient skills when you make an INT or WIS check related to it. While traveling for an hour or more in your chosen terrain, difficult terrain doesn’t slow your group’s travel, your group can’t become lost except by magical means, you remain alert to danger even when you are engaged in another activity, you can move stealthily at a normal pace (while alone), you find twice as much food while foraging, and while tracking creatures, you learn the exact number, sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

special_abilties.name: Fighting Style: Two-Weapon Fighting
special_abilties.desc: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

special_abilties.name: Primeval Awareness
special_abilties.desc: As an action, you can expend one ranger spell slot (1 minute per level of spell slot) to sense whether any aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain). This feature doesn’t reveal the creatures’ location or number.

list: When a Large or larger creature you can see within 5 ft. of you hits or misses you with an attack, you can use your reaction to attack that creature immediately after its attack.
special_abilties.name: Hunter’s Prey
special_abilties.desc: Giant Killer

special_abilties.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilties.desc: You have advantage on saves against poison and resistance against poison damage.

special_abilties.name: Dwarven Combat Trainin
special_abilties.desc: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.
You gain proficiency with your choice of smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.
special_abilties.name: Tool Proficiency
Dwarven Armor Training
special_abilties.desc: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

special_abilties.name: Stonecunning
special_abilties.desc: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.description: or 1d10+3 if used with two hands for a melee attack

special_abilties.name: Otherworldy Patron
special_abilties.desc: The Fiend

special_abilties.name: Pact Magic
special_abilties.desc: You can cast known warlock spells using CHA as your spellcasting modifier (Spell DC 12, Spell Attack +4). You can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus.

special_abilties.name: Dark One’s Blessing
special_abilties.desc: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 HP, you gain 5 temp HP

list: Agonizing Blast: When you cast eldritch blast, add +2 to the damage it deals on a hit.
Eldritch Spear: When you cast eldritch blast, its range is 300 ft.
special_abilties.name: Eldritch Invocations
special_abilties.desc: You learn fragments of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability.

special_abilties.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilties.desc: You have advantage on saves against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

special_abilties.name: Trance
special_abilties.desc: You don't need to sleep, but meditate semiconsciously for 4 hours a day. While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

special_abilties.name: Elf Weapon Training
special_abilties.desc: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

special_abilties.name: Fey Step
special_abilties.desc: Once per short rest, you can cast the misty step spell.

special_abilties.name: Natural Athlete
special_abilties.desc: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

special_abilties.name: Stone’s Endurance
special_abilties.desc: As a reaction, reduce damage dealt to you by 1d12 -1 once per short rest.

special_abilties.name: Powerful Build
special_abilties.desc: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

special_abilties.name: Mountain Born
special_abilties.desc: You don't suffer the penalties for being in high altitudes, and have resistance to cold damage.

list: You can reroll a 1 or 2 on damage dice with melee weapons wielded with two hands.
special_abilties.name: Fighting Style
special_abilties.desc: Great Weapon Fighting

special_abilties.name: Second Wind
special_abilties.desc: Once per short rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + 3 HP.

special_abilties.name: Action Surge
special_abilties.desc: You can take one additional action on your turn. This can be used 1 times per short rest.

special_abilties.name: Martial Archetype
special_abilties.desc: Champion

special_abilties.name: Improved Critical
special_abilties.desc: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

actions.name: Homebound Axe
actions.description: This axe, under most circumstances, returns to the user after being thrown.

special_abilties.name: Charge
special_abilties.desc: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

special_abilties.name: Primal Bond
special_abilties.desc: You can add your PB(+2) to any ability check or saving throw that the beast takes.

special_abilties.name: Amphibious
special_abilties.desc: The beast can breathe both air and water

special_abilties.name: Primal Bond
special_abilties.desc: You can add your PB(+2) to any ability check or saving throw that the beast takes.

actions.name: Binding Strike
actions.description: and the target is grappled (escape DC equals your spell save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target

special_abilties.name: Flyby
special_abilties.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of reach

special_abilties.name: Primal Bond
special_abilties.desc: You can add your PB(+2) to any ability check or saving throw that the beast takes.
